title: Game Just Crashed & we were 11v4
body: Just crashed in a r5 and we were destroying then game crashes :/

replies.body:
Very sus, or is it? There's a fifty percent chance that when you randomly disconnect from a game that your team will be ahead.

How exactly did it crash? And what did you do afterward?

Something very similar just happened to me as well. When I tried to rejoin the game I got a firewall error and restarted my computer a few times. After about 5 minutes the orange reconnect button didn't appear when I logged into LoL. The game definitely hadn't ended as it was about 5 minutes into the game when it happened. The match hasn't appeared in my Match History and I can go into a custom game just fine. I'm pretty sure it's a server issue as something like this has never happened before.
Something similar happened to me, are you getting a firewall error?
